name: Hatenna

evolution.description: Hatenna can evolve into Hattrem at level 6 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 7 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Calm Pokémon. Via the protrusion on its head, it senses other creatures’ emotions. If you don’t have a calm disposition, it will never warm up to you.

abilities.name: Healer
abilities.description: As an action, this Pokemon may touch a creature to heal poison, burn, or paralysis. When it uses this ability, roll a d4. On the a result of 1 or 2, the status effect is moved to itself.

abilities.name: Anticipation
abilities.description: When this Pokémon enters the battle, an opponent must reveal if it has a move that the Pokémon is vulnerable to. The move itself does not have to be revealed, only that there is such a move.

abilities.name: Magic Bounce
abilities.description: Once per long rest, when succumbing to a negative status effect, this Pokémon can instead reflect the effect back on the attacker.
